EventMapActivity - Class in com.example.aurora.map
EventMapActivity Displays a Google Map showing: The event's location (eventLat, eventLng) All entrants' join locations from waitingLocations subcollection Features: Custom event pin icon Custom entrant pin icon Auto-zoom and camera bounds to show all markers Back button to close the map screen This screen is opened when user taps "View Map" inside event details.
